attributes.action: Hold an independent inquiry into the mismanagement of Britians borders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A full Independent inquiry to investigate the mismanagement of Immigration and Asylum into the UK during current Labour era 1997 - 200? .
The inquiry would aim to find out if the Labour government planned to open Britains borders and also why.

- To use migrant workers as a tool to keep the wages of the working class low.

- To engage in a Social Engineering project.

- Or just a blindness of the consequences.

Britain needs to know what went wrong, why and who was/is responsible so we can learn the lessons and make sure it does not happen again.
